column5: hey guys,  just wondering if any of you had reccomendations on outfitters/guides youve used before for fishing big brookies on spinning or fly tackle in ontario.  or would i be better off driving north on a DIY trip?  any good rivers/lakes with good success rates?  thanks,  Mike  PS - im heading up to sibbalds point next weekend, hows the fishing on simcoe in that area
Lake Nipigon first week of September. Buzz Taisley's charters or Nighthawk charters. Biggest specks in the world!
